title: Price drop: Play Street Fighter II, Zelda and 70,000 other games on this retro console
description: The Kinhank Super Console X2 Pro is a retro-style games console preloaded with more than 70,000 classic games. (via Cult of Mac - Apple news, rumors, reviews and how-tos)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: The Kinhank Super Console X2 Pro is a retro-style games console preloaded with more than 70,000 classic games.
text: Deals Get the Kinhank Super Consple X2 Pro on sale less than $90. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals The Kinhank Super Console X2 Pro is a retro-style gaming console preloaded with more than 70,000 classic games. It also lets you use your favorite streaming apps to watch videos. It’s great for any household — and a perfect gift for any gamer on your list. This retro games and streaming console is on sale now for just $89.97 with free shipping. However, that deep discount won’t last much longer. Kinhank Super Console X2 Pro: Get 70,000+ games on this retro console What kind of classic games are we talking about? Everything from vintage faves like Space Invaders, Street Fighter II and The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time to modern classics like The Last of Us and Rayman Legends. (See the full game list.) And, unlike Apple Arcade — which gives you access to slightly more than 200 games and costs $6.99 per month — you pay just once for access to 70,000-plus games with the Kinhank Super Console X2 Pro. The X2 may come jam-packed with old-school games, but the tech behind it is all modern. This hybrid gaming and streaming console combines Android 9.0 with EmuElec 4.5, a gaming platform dedicated entirely to retro games. This dual approach lets you jump seamlessly from retro games to streaming, which is great if you need a break after a long session. Under the hood, this retro games and streaming console rocks an Amlogic S905X2 chip and Mali-G31MP2 GPU. That’s why even graphically intense games play smoothly in stunning 4K UHD resolution. Modern connections for your gaming and streaming needs The Kinhank Super Console X2 also delivers modern connectivity. It comes equipped with dual-band Wi-Fi (2.4G and 5G) and Bluetooth 5.0, making it easy to connect controllers, headphones and other wireless accessories. And, with HDMI, USB and Ethernet ports, the affordable retro games console is compatible with TVs, projectors and computer monitors. You can set it up in any room or take it on the go. It also comes with two wireless controllers, a 256GB game card loaded with thousands of games and a USB receiver, allowing for instant plug-and-play setup. A built-in, oversize fan keeps things cool during extended sessions, so this retro gaming console can handle hours of play. Not only will the Super Console X2 open up a portal to the golden age of gaming, but it also doubles as a media center that even supports streaming apps. Save on a Kinhank Super Consple X2 Pro retro games console The Kinhank Super Console X2 opens up a portal to the golden age of gaming and doubles as a media center for streaming apps. It’s a perfect gift for anyone who loves classic games. Get the Kinhank Super Consple X2 Pro on sale for $89.97, with free shipping to the contiguous United States. That’s a 43% discount off the regular price of $159.99. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this deal on the Kinhank Super Console X2 retro games console on November 22, 2024. We updated the information.
html:
• Deals

The Kinhank Super Console X2 Pro is a retro-style gaming console preloaded with more than 70,000 classic games. It also lets you use your favorite streaming apps to watch videos. It’s great for any household — and a perfect gift for any gamer on your list.

This retro games and streaming console is on sale now for just $89.97 with free shipping. However, that deep discount won’t last much longer.

Kinhank Super Console X2 Pro: Get 70,000+ games on this retro console

What kind of classic games are we talking about? Everything from vintage faves like Space Invaders, Street Fighter II and The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time to modern classics like The Last of Us and Rayman Legends. (See the full game list.)

And, unlike Apple Arcade — which gives you access to slightly more than 200 games and costs $6.99 per month — you pay just once for access to 70,000-plus games with the Kinhank Super Console X2 Pro.

The X2 may come jam-packed with old-school games, but the tech behind it is all modern. This hybrid gaming and streaming console combines Android 9.0 with EmuElec 4.5, a gaming platform dedicated entirely to retro games. This dual approach lets you jump seamlessly from retro games to streaming, which is great if you need a break after a long session.

Under the hood, this retro games and streaming console rocks an Amlogic S905X2 chip and Mali-G31MP2 GPU. That’s why even graphically intense games play smoothly in stunning 4K UHD resolution.

Modern connections for your gaming and streaming needs

The Kinhank Super Console X2 also delivers modern connectivity. It comes equipped with dual-band Wi-Fi (2.4G and 5G) and Bluetooth 5.0, making it easy to connect controllers, headphones and other wireless accessories. And, with HDMI, USB and Ethernet ports, the affordable retro games console is compatible with TVs, projectors and computer monitors. You can set it up in any room or take it on the go.

It also comes with two wireless controllers, a 256GB game card loaded with thousands of games and a USB receiver, allowing for instant plug-and-play setup.

A built-in, oversize fan keeps things cool during extended sessions, so this retro gaming console can handle hours of play. Not only will the Super Console X2 open up a portal to the golden age of gaming, but it also doubles as a media center that even supports streaming apps.

Save on a Kinhank Super Consple X2 Pro retro games console

The Kinhank Super Console X2 opens up a portal to the golden age of gaming and doubles as a media center for streaming apps. It’s a perfect gift for anyone who loves classic games.

Get the Kinhank Super Consple X2 Pro on sale for $89.97, with free shipping to the contiguous United States. That’s a 43% discount off the regular price of $159.99.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this deal on the Kinhank Super Console X2 retro games console on November 22, 2024. We updated the information.
